viewData.name: Phi Areola Marker Pen
viewData.short_description: Phi areola marker pen is a marking pencil tool, used to mark the dots for the created shape and size of the areolanipple to continue working by following the outlines measured and not to go out of the shape or do any unplanned mistakes.┬á
viewData.long_description: It can be easily removed afterwards with Phi wipes.
